co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.ethereum

Class NfcTransactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • TransactionManager
      • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.ethereum.NfcTransactionManager

  • public class NfcTransactionManager
extends TransactionManager
    Extends web3j Transaction manager, to create ETH transactions using the Infineon card for signing.
